card.name: Default Discriminator
card.rules: As Default Discriminator enters the battlefield, choose a color. Creatures of that color get -1/-0. If the chosen color is the most common color among all creatures or a color tied for most common, those creatures get an additional -1/-1.

card.name: Spendbringer
card.rules: Untap Spendbringer during each other player’s untap step. T: Destroy target token permanent. 3, T: Tap or untap another target permanent. 6, T: Create three Treasure tokens.

card.name: Street Meme
card.rules: 1: Street Meme gains a creature type of your choice* and gets +1/+1 until end of turn. Use this ability only once each turn.
card.flavor: Haha sega sam Boiko, 2 leva molq.

card.name: Traction Twinks
card.rules: When Traction Twinks enters the battlefield and at the beginning of your upkeep, choose a creature type other than Citizen. Creatures of the chosen type get +2/+0.
card.flavor: NE SE PREDAVAITE IMATE PULNATA NI PODKREPA

card.name: ***E znaesh brat
card.rules: Affinity for white permanents. Whenever an opponent casts a spell, tap target white permanent.
card.flavor: shegata e che dqlkam byalo dqlkam byalo za shtyalo i ne shtyalo i po nqkoe vreme se ubiva ot belo

card.name: *Baba Motivator
card.rules: When *Baba Motivator enters the battlefield or attacks, create a Stuff token. Activated abilities of permanents you control cost 1 less. This effect can’t reduce the mana in costs of nontoken permanents to less than one mana.

card.name: 4i4o mitko*
card.rules: Vigilance
card.flavor: Eh ako ya upravlyavah az taya strana kude shteshe da sme!

card.name: Ambulance
card.rules: Crew 2 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 2 or greater: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.) Whenever Ambulance attacks, regenerate another target creature with toughness 3 or less. (The next time this creature would be destroyed this turn, it isn’t. Instead tap it, remove all damage from it, and remove it from combat.)

card.name: Clue
card.rules: 2, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.

card.name: Baba of the Feast
card.rules: Whenever Baba of the Feast or another Human enters the battlefield under your control, create a Stuff token.
card.flavor: “...a shtom shte idva i Penka, shte trqbva da podgotvq poveche salata i...”

card.name: Clue
card.rules: 2, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.

card.name: Bird Brood Baba
card.rules: Whenever Bird Brood Baba enters the battlefield, create a Stuff token. Whenever a Stuff enters the battlefield under your control, create a 1/1 white artifact bird creature token with flying.

card.name: Clue
card.rules: 2, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.

card.name: Butcher of Dreams
card.rules: Players can’t cast more than one spell per turn. Abilities cost 2 more to activate if not activated as a sorcery. (When the stack is empty on your main phase)

card.name: Stuff
card.rules: 1, T: Sacrifice this artifact: Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Caring Baba*
card.rules: Vigilance Whenever this creature enters the battlefield, another target creature you control gets +1/+1 and gains vigilance until end of turn. *soulbond (You may pair this creature with another unpaired creature when either enters the battlefield. They remain paired for as long as you control both of them.)
card.flavor: “Ela hapni babe.”

card.name: Stuff
card.rules: 1, T: Sacrifice this artifact: Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Chief Inspector
card.rules: Vigilance Artifacts and creatures your opponents control enter the battlefield tapped.
card.flavor: Priqtel, faktura za taq banica imash li?

card.name: Stuff
card.rules: 1, T: Sacrifice this artifact: Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Clueless Gossipers
card.rules: Clueless Gossipers doesn’t untap during your untap step. Whenever another creature enters the battlefield, untap Clueless Gossipers and it gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Stuff
card.rules: 1, T: Sacrifice this artifact: Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Crossroad Siege
card.rules: As Crossroad Siege enters the battlefield, choose Drivers or Divers. • Drivers — Attacking creatures you control have first strike. • Divers — Whenever a creature attacks you, it doesn’t untap during its owner’s next untap phase.

card.name: Deny Tresspass
card.rules: This spell costs 2 less to cast if you control a Soldier. Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt by tapped creatures this turn.
card.flavor: “Kmetat moje da otmeni provezhdaneto na sabitieto, kogato ima danni, che zastrashava obshtestveniya red.” -Zakona

card.name: Treasure
card.rules: T, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.

card.name: Devoted Baba
card.rules: You may choose not to untap Devoted Baba during your untap step. At the beginning of your upkeep, if this creature is tapped, create a Stuff token. T: Create a Stuff token.
card.flavor: Vnucite na baba Ivanka ne sa bili gladni ot godini.

card.name: Treasure
card.rules: T, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.

card.name: Ginka's Reproach
card.rules: Ginka’s Reproach deals 4 damage to target attacking or blocking creature.
card.flavor: Na Poduyane, Ginka beshe popitana za cigara ot narlkoman. No tya znae i vinagi e znaela che takiva recidivisti ne zaslujavat dori malko proshka.

card.name: Humble Exchange
card.rules: Target creature’s controller sacrifices it, then that player gains control of target creature you control.
card.flavor: Dobre doshli uvajaemi dedo Pencho.

card.name: Palace
card.rules: T: Add one mana of any color.

card.name: Janitor Seagull
card.rules: Flying Whenever Janitor Seagull deals combat damage to a player, you may exile target creature card from a graveyard. If you do, you gain 1 life.

card.name: Emblem
card.rules: At the beginning of your end step, create three Stuff tokens.

card.name: Kuci, Fate Tester
card.rules: Choose Higher or Lower converted mana cost. You and another target player reveal the top card of your library. If you guessed right, draw a card. Until your next turn, creatures with power equal to Kuci’s Loyalty cannot attack you or planeswalkers you control. Create a 1/1 white Human creature token.
card.flavor: put

card.name: Loyal Companion
card.flavor: “bal bal bal” — Sharo

card.name: Mark of the Devoters
card.rules: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+2 and has vigilance.

card.name: Menacing baba*
card.rules: As long as Menacing baba* is untapped, creatures your opponents control get -1/-0.

card.name: Misplace
card.rules: Exile target permanent. Return that card to the battlefield under their owner’s control at the beginning of the next end step.
card.flavor: Abe kude parkirah snoshti be ?!?

card.name: Oppressive-will Baba
card.rules: Tap two Elders you control: Tap up to two target creatures.
card.flavor: Chekai chekai, ela da ti kajem kakvo da mi zemesh ot pazara.

card.name: Outlaster*
card.rules: Shop 1 (1, T: Create a Stuff Token. Shop only as a sorcery.) Whenever a Treasure enters the battlefield under your control, untap Outlaster*.
card.flavor: A, brashnoto e na namalenie.

card.name: Pararoyal Limousine
card.rules: Flying, Vigilance Crew 1 Whenever Pararoyal Limousine deals combat damage to a player, exile target creature that player controls until Pararoyal Limousine leaves the battlefield.

card.name: Populace Strike
card.rules: Split Second (As long as this spell is on the stack, players can’t cast spells or activate abilities that aren’t mana abilities.) (As long as this spell is on the stack, players can’t cast spells or activate abilities that aren’t mana abilities.) Permanents enter the battlefield tapped this turn. Players can’t cast spells this turn. Creatures can’t attack this turn.

card.name: Respected Matriarch
card.rules: Vigilance Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to this creature.
card.flavor: “Ti nedei mnogo zna’ “

card.name: Restless Aggressor
card.rules: Whenever Restless Aggressor attacks, regenerate it. (The next time this creature would be destroyed this turn, it isn’t. Instead tap it, remove all damage from it, and remove it from combat.)
card.flavor: Elate mi poveche be svine!

card.name: Rhetoristic Archangel
card.rules: Flying Whenever an opponent casts a spell or activates an ability that isn’t a mana ability, counter it unless that player pays 2.
card.flavor: “Vijdam i neproshtavam.”

card.name: Smoke Down**
card.rules: Smoke Down** 2 damage to each attacking creature. Create a Clue and a tapped Treasure.
card.flavor: daimu flavor

card.name: Streetwise Trainee
card.rules: Vigilance T: Target creature gains first strike. Activate this ability only if Streetwise Trainee’s power is 3 or greater.
card.flavor: Purvo pravish tri serii kofichki i togava se kachvash na losta, bratko!

card.name: Traffic-Law Enforcer
card.rules: W, T: Tap target creature an opponent controls. If it is a Vehicle, it doesn’t untap during its controller’s next untap phase.
card.flavor: “...kazvam vi che tam imashe znak STOP gospodine, pisha vi akt.”

card.name: Unyielding Babushka*
card.rules: W: Unyielding Babushka* gains vigilance until end of turn. When Unyielding Babushka* deals combat damage to a player, scry 1.
card.flavor: Tozi ritual go pravq ot godini nared. Edin put na den i otkakto se pomnq sum vse taka zdrava i jiznena.

card.name: Veropochitnitsa
card.rules: When Veropochitnitsa enters the battlefield, gain 3 life and scry 1.
card.flavor: Judas 1:1:7 ...Kakto i Sodom, Gomor i okolnite im gradove, koito, podobno na tyah, se predadoha na bludstvo i izpadvaha v protivoestestveni porotsi, sa postaveni za primer kato nosyat nakazanieto na vechniya ogun. Opazil ni Gospod, amin!

card.name: Watchful Officer*
card.rules: Vigilance Other soldiers you control have +1/+1 and Vigilance.
card.flavor: “Vanka, nabliudavai go toq narkoman ei tam, che neshto me sumnqva...”

card.name: Ela Brat
card.rules: Create two 1/1 white Human creature tokens.
card.flavor: e ot koga ne sme se vijdali

card.name: Ashkolsoon
card.rules: Enchant Creature Whenever Ashkolsoon enters the battlefield, tap three target creatures. Enchanted creature doesn’t untap during its’ controller’s untap step.

card.name: Asset Fascination
card.rules: Enchant player Creatures enchanted player controls cannot be targets of spells or abilities of enchanted player. Enchanted player can’t untap more than one creature during their untap step.

card.name: Augur of Opacity *flav
card.rules: Whenever Augur of Opacity *flav becomes blocked, creatures blocking it get -X/-0 where X is the number of cards in your hand.
card.flavor: Dobriq politik moje da ne e prozrachen v deistviqta i resheniqta si, no trqbva da e s prozrachni ochila.

card.name: Battalion Alignment
card.rules: Create a 1/1 blue Soldier creature token for each tapped creature your opponents control.
card.flavor: Hodom marsh!

card.name: Captivated Audience
card.rules: Captivated Audience doesn’t untap during your untap step. Whenever a player casts a spell, untap Captivated Audience and it gains +1/-1 until end of turn.

card.name: City-Council Advisor
card.rules: When City-Council Advisor enters the battlefield or deals combat damage to a player, scry 1.
card.flavor: Predi poveche ot mesec poiskah proverka za spreni obshtestveni poruchki v stranata.

card.name: Coalition Agitator
card.rules: Skulk (This creature can’t be blocked by creatures with greater power.) Whenever Coalition Agitator or another Advisor you control deals combat damage to a player, you may draw a card and discard a card.

card.name: Collective Command
card.rules: Choose two — • Tap two target creatures. • Return target tapped creature to its owner’s hand. • Draw a card. • Counter target creature spell.

card.name: Deploy Democracy
card.rules: Counter target spell. Create a 1/1 blue Soldier creature token.
card.flavor: “Speshniq otrqd be izpraten nezabavno sled podadeniq signal za zapalena dimka v kofa”

card.name: Deport
card.rules: Return target creature to its owner’s hand. If it’s tapped, put it on top of its owner’s library instead.
card.flavor: Aide na vlaka za Kaspichan.

card.name: Descendant of Vanga
card.rules: 1U: Look at the top X cards of your library, where X is the number of cards in your hand, then put them back in any order.
card.flavor: Budeshteto ti sudurja dvama cigani, gora i susedkata Penka. 20 leva.

card.name: District Informant
card.rules: Skulk (This creature can’t be blocked by creatures with greater power.) Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, look at the top card of that player’s library, then you may put that card third from the top.

card.name: e**
card.rules: Return target permanent and all permanents attached to it — If you control more creatures than —

card.name: Employ
card.rules: Enchant creature You control enchanted creature. At the beginning of your upkeep, tap enchanted creature and create a Treasure token.
card.flavor: Dobre doshul v nashata kompaniq! Smqnata ti e ot Ponedelnik do Nedelq.

card.name: Goods Inspection
card.rules: Exile any number of target artifacts, then return them to the battlefield under their owner’s control. Draw two cards.
card.flavor: A belejka za tiq stoki imash li?

card.name: In the Spotlight
card.rules: This spell costs 2 less to cast if it targets an Advisor you control. Target creature gains hexproof until end of turn. Draw a card.
card.flavor: “Ne chuh vuprosa, no zaedno rabotim za blagoto na stranata neprestanno!”

card.name: Kukka Tupalmaster
card.rules: T: Kukka Tupalmaster deals 1 damage to any target. If this ability targets a tapped creature, it deals 2 damage instead.
card.flavor: Kuchetata sa kato jivotnite - opravqt se samo s boi.

card.name: Lantern-Lit Ascendant
card.rules: Flying When Lantern-Lit Ascendant enters the battlefield, you may return target tapped creature to its owner’s hand. When Lantern-Lit Ascendant becomes tapped, you may return it to your hand.

card.name: Lawmending
card.rules: All creatures gain shroud until end of turn. (Those creatures can’t be the target of spells or abilities.) Scry 2.

card.name: Major Deschematorov*
card.rules: Major Deschematorov* can’t attack unless an opponent controls an untapped land.
card.flavor: Mayora predpochitashe da si stoi v ofisa. No daje i toi ne mojeshe da ustoi na izpulnenata s ekshun akciq.

card.name: Mark of the Countless Roads
card.rules: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has flying.
card.flavor: Ne e lesno da si katadjiq. Nujni sa: Zorko oko, burzi refleksi, da iskash i gonish svoeto.

card.name: Niki Kunchev, Richmaker
card.rules: Reveal the top card of your library. An opponent may put it into your graveyard. Draw a card. Tap target creature. It doesn’t untap during its’ controller’s next untap phase. Draw ten cards. Untap up to ten permanents you control.

card.name: Obshtinar Footpad
card.rules: Flying, Vigilance T: Target opponent taps an untapped creature they control unless they pay 2.

card.name: Pesky Pest
card.rules: Flying At the beginning of each combat, any opponent may tap an untapped creature they control. If a player does, tap Pesky Pest.
card.flavor: bzzzZZBZZzzZbzz!

card.name: Postman Courier
card.rules: Flying Whenever Postman Courier becomes tapped, create a Clue token.
card.flavor: “Pri vsichki sluchai tryabva da si iskren, i pri dobrite, i pri loshite novini. Togava horata razbirat poslanieto ti.”

card.name: Preposterous Scholar*
card.rules: Preposterous Scholar* enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it. Creatures your opponents control with power less than Preposterous Scholar*, power don’t untap during their controller’s untap step.

card.name: Recollective Response*
card.rules: Counter target spell unless its controller pays 1. You may choose a permanent, a card in a graveyard or reveal a card with the same name that you own from outside the game. If you do, counter that spell instead. **contrast
card.flavor: “I swear I’ve seen this happen already!” — Mittak, wisdom collector

card.name: Seepage Agent*
card.rules: Seepage Agent* can’t be blocked as long as defending player controls three or more creatures.

card.name: Sighteeing's Side Sight
card.rules: Scry 3, then draw three cards.
card.flavor: “Eha!”

card.name: Soothe the Masses
card.rules: Creatures your opponents control get -2/-0 until end of turn. Draw a card.
card.flavor: Dragi grajdani, pravitelstvoto se razpuska, ne e nujno da protestirate.

card.name: Temporal Shanomancer
card.rules: T: Change a target of target spell or ability to this creature. Temporal Shanomancer.
card.flavor: Alo, ne znam kvo si misli6, ama ya vij - ti kato me gledash, mislish li che sum vcherashen???

card.name: Ushev Tag-Squad
card.rules: Flying Whenever Ushev Tag-Squad deals combat damage to a player, up to X permanents don’t untap during their controller’s next untap step, where X is equal to the damage dealt.

card.name: Vastroad Enforcer
card.rules: Flying Whenever this creature deals combat damage to an opponent, target creature doesn’t untap during its controller’s next untap step.
card.flavor: Momche, lichna karta imash li?

card.name: Vigilantive Opportunist
card.rules: Vigilantive Opportunist can’t be blocked if defending player controls a tapped creature. Whenever Vigilantive Opportunist deals combat damage to an opponent, draw a card.

card.name: Sorry
card.rules: Counter target spell unless any player pays 4.

card.name: Bakshish
card.rules: X: Target creature you control with power X can’t be blocked this turn. You lose X life.
card.flavor: “Ot mladost do obelq? E to ti e na dve krachki...”

card.name: Belot Grinder Party
card.rules: Belot Grinder Party enters the battlefield tapped. Whenever Belot Grinder Party dies, target opponent creates three Treasure tokens.

card.name: Callow Dupe
card.rules: When Callow Dupe dies, create two Treasure tokens. (They’re artifacts with “T, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.”)
card.flavor: “Sofia momche pecheli po 372 leva na den. Samo budalite oshte ne znaqt kak! Cuknete tuk za da razberete”

card.name: Constable Coercer
card.rules: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may pay 2. If you do not, sacrifice Constable Coercer at the beginning of your next end step.
card.flavor: “Policaqt ot Sofia be arestuvan po podozrenie za poluchen rushvet, sled kato grajdanin se oplakal. Sreshtu 85 lv slujitelql obeshtal da ne mu vruchva pirzovka.”

card.name: Crewcaller*
card.rules: 2B, T: Exile target creature card from a graveyard. Create a 1/1 red Goblin creature token and a Treasure token.
card.flavor: Za romite razlikata mejdu pogrebenie i svatba e samo v broq na prisustvashtite.

card.name: Dark Deal Executive
card.rules: 0: Target creature an opponent controls can’t block Dark Deal Executive this turn. That creature’s controller creates a Treasure. Activate this ability only once each turn.
card.flavor: Blagodarq za izkazanato doverie gospodin Pavlov.

card.name: Enemy of the Government
card.rules: If you control an Advisor, it costs 1 less and you may cast Enemy of the Government as though it had flash. Exile target creature. Create a Clue token and a tapped Treasure token.
card.flavor: Ot utre ne si na rabota.

card.name: Festering Cigan
card.rules: Whenever Festering Cigan or another goblin enters the battlefield under your control, target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.
card.flavor: “Kva e taq smrad be?!?”

card.name: Gray Secretary of GERB
card.rules: Haste Whenever enters the battlefield or leaves the battlefield, each opponent loses X life, and you gain X life, where X is the amount of damage dealt to them this turn.

card.name: Grisly Roaches
card.rules: Tribute 2 (As this creature enters the battlefield, an opponent of your choice may put two +1/+1 counters on it.) Lifelink When Grisly Roaches enters the battlefield, if its tribute wasn’t paid, target opponent sacrifices a nontoken permanent.

card.name: Head of Affairs*
card.rules: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may sacrifice a creature. If you do, put two +1/+1 counters on target creature you control or target creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn.

card.name: Lost in the Hoods
card.rules: Destroy target untapped creature.
card.flavor: “SMLYAHA OT BOY S BUHALKI DO SMART ISTINSKI BALGARIN PRAVOZASHTITNIK! Poveche v kusnata emisiya na BTV.”*

card.name: Lutvi, Sorrowsower
card.rules: Flying, Deathtouch When Lutvi deals combat damage to a player, that player discards a card. If the discarded card is a creature with power 3 or less, draw a card and lose 1 life.

card.name: Mad Auntie
card.rules: Other Goblin creatures you control get +1/+1. T: Regenerate another target Goblin.
card.flavor: Ehhhehehheheh...

card.name: Mark of the Afflictful
card.rules: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has lifelink.
card.flavor: Pechalba na vash grub, sako na moya.

card.name: Newswatcher*
card.rules: Newswatcher* doesn’t untap during your untap step. Whenever one or more creatures die, untap Newswatcher*.
card.flavor: E, alou, ela glei kvo sta po novinite, pak avtobus deca umre!

card.name: Pestilent Expert
card.rules: Menace
card.flavor: “Ima nad 30 nauchni publikatsii i edna kniga, kasaeshta otchuzhdavaneto na nedvizhimi imoti na grazhdanite i tyahnoto obezshtetyavane i analiz na praktikata na Varhovniya sad.”

card.name: Psycholobotomist Duo
card.rules: At the end of each turn, each opponent that was dealt damage by an Advisor loses 1 life.
card.flavor: ...no neka vidim otnovo kak dete plache sled shamar ot maika si-

card.name: Ritual of Trash
card.rules: As an additional cost to cast this spell, you may pay 2B. If you do, return target Goblin creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. Return up to one target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Semitic Cockroach
card.rules: Skulk (This creature can’t be blocked by creatures with greater power.) When Semitic Cockroach enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice another permanent. If you do, put a +1/+1 counter on Semitic Cockroach.
card.flavor: “brat gledal li si Borat?”

card.name: Servant of Woe
card.rules: 3B: Target opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.
card.flavor: Nie garantirame edno po-dobro budeshte za Bulgaria, sled kato uvelichim danucite s 5%.

card.name: Shank
card.rules: Target creature gets +1/+0 and gains deathtouch until end of turn. Scry 1

card.name: Shiban Lakom
card.rules: Skulk (This creature can’t be blocked by creatures with greater power.) 1: Shiban Lakom gets -1/+1 until end of turn.
card.flavor: “He’s just playing with us, Vasilev.”

card.name: Slavi, Dreadful Demagogue
card.rules: Create a tapped 2/2 black Zombie token. Destroy target creature. Its controller creates a tapped 2/2 black Zombie token Exile all cards from target player’s graveyard. For each creature card exiled this way, put a 2/2 black Zombie creature token

card.name: Slavi's Show
card.rules: At the beginning of your upkeep, you draw a card and you lose 1 life. B, Sacrifice a creature: Create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.

card.name: Timely Team*art
card.rules: Create five 1/1 black Advisor creature tokens. Sacrifice them at the end of your next turn.
card.flavor: Povecheto balgari priemat i podkrepyat izvanrednoto polozhenie. Tova lichi ot ekspresen telefonen sondazh na „Galap interneshanal”, proveden sred 1000 palnoletni balgari mezhdu 20 i 23 mart.

card.name: Undeathful Cigan
card.rules: Whenever another Goblin you control dies, you may pay its mana cost. If you do, return it to the battlefield tapped under its owner’s control at the beginning of the next end step. **+1+1

card.name: Vicious Aspirant
card.rules: Deathtouch, Lifelink Whenever this creature becomes blocked, defending player loses 3 life.
card.flavor: ...pravim vsichko po silite si za da moje da nasurchim prosperiteta na vsichki nashi sugrajdani, koito celqt da postignat poveche v tehnite sobstveni...

card.name: Webscape Dramatist
card.flavor: Ey mishki mozhe da ne sam svetets ama sam se dokazal mnogo poveche ot mnogo mutrichki s Deystvie Volya Uvazhenie ne kato povecheto na dva shamara da myalkate kato bebeta plachete kato vi upre nozha do.vrata.strah li nyamate nauchete se da govorite v ochite i da ste mazhe nikoy ne obicha putkite. edno.momiche imali da kaze losha duma za men.zashtoto se darzha prilichno uvazhavam i gi pazya davam dushata i sartseto kato si zasluzhava. zashto li zashtoto sam ulichno momche!

card.name: Smetki
card.rules: Target player loses 3 life and you gain 3 life. Draw a card.

card.name: *Money's charm
card.rules: You skip your next untap step. End the phase. (Exile all spells and abilities from the stack, including this spell. If it’s the combat phase, remove all attackers and blockers from combat.)
card.flavor: Shefe eto ti dvaise kinta i koi otkude e.

card.name: Battle-Ready Bargainist 2 *
card.rules: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may pay R. If you do put a +1/+1 counter on another target creature you control. It must attack this turn if able.

card.name: Battle-Ready Bargainist*
card.rules: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may pay X. If you do, put a +1/+1 counter on X target creatures you control.

card.name: Becigan
card.rules: Enchant Creature When Becigan enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 red Goblin creature token. Enchanted creature is a Goblin and has “Other goblin creatures you control get +1/+1.”

card.name: Bloodthirsty Mugger
card.rules: Menace When Bloodthirsty Mugger enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 red Goblin creature token. Other Goblins you control have menace.

card.name: Cheap Shot Batka
card.rules: Impulsive Reaction - When this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability the first time each turn, it gains first strike until end of turn.
card.flavor: Ako ti udarim edna plesnica nqma da se pravish na tolkova interesen !

card.name: Cigan Broodmother
card.rules: When Cigan Broodmother enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 red Goblin creature token. R: Tap two untapped goblins. If you do, create a tapped 1/1 red Goblin creature token. Activate only as a sorcery

card.name: Ciganate of Calamity
card.rules: Whenever a nontoken goblin creature you control attacks choose one — • Exile target card from a graveyard, then look at the top card of target player’s library. • Each player draws, then discards a card. • It deals 1 damage to target player.

card.name: Crimson Meadows Regular
card.rules: Haste R, T: Target opponent sacrifices an artifact. If it’s a nontoken permanent, create a Treasure token. Hgh!

card.name: Crowdstorm**
card.rules: deals 3 damage to six targets.
card.flavor: I da padnem, i da biem, pak shte se ubiem.

card.name: Divert Intentions
card.rules: This spell costs 2 less if its target targets a creature with power 2 or less. You may choose new targets for target spell or ability.
card.flavor: “Kakvo she mi kajesh eto vij go rodila samm go as.”

card.name: Fleeting Bravado
card.rules: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has provoke. (When this attacks, you may have target creature defending player controls untap and block it if able.) R: Enchanted creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Foul-Fit Fiend
card.rules: Provoke (When this attacks, you may have target creature defending player controls untap and block it if able.) Foul-Fit Fiend doesn’t untap during your untap step. Whenever a creature with greater power enters the battlefield, untap Foul-Fit Fiend.

card.name: Funky, Humongous Brute*
card.rules: Up to two target creatures get +1/+0 and gain trample until end of turn. Until end of turn, Funky becomes a legendary 3/3 Boar creature with indestructible, trample and haste. Funky deals 2 damage to each creature you don’t control. Those creatures cannot block this turn.

card.name: Fusefire
card.rules: Fusefire deals 5 damage to target creature. RRRRR: Return Fusefire from your graveyard to your hand.
card.flavor: Ryadka Piratka, za vseki e mechta!

card.name: Grinning Mangus
card.rules: R, Exile Grinning Mangus: Create four Treasures. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.
card.flavor: “Take care what you offer her owner. Banica, perhaps. Coins. But nothing of value!” —Stoyo, village eccentric

card.name: Hammer Axe
card.rules: As an additional cost to cast Hammer Axe, tap an untapped creature you control. Hammer Axe deals 4 damage to target player or planeswalker.
card.flavor: Op!

card.name: Hooligany
card.rules: Choose one — • Target creature you control deal damage equal to its power to another target creature. • Two target Warriors you control each deal damage equal to their power to another target creature.

card.name: Little Foncho
card.rules: 1R, T, Sacrifice a Goblin: Gain control of target creature an opponent controls with power less than or equal to 1 plus the number of Goblins you control until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gains haste until end of turn. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.

card.name: Mangiarch
card.rules: Sacrifice a Goblin: Create a tapped Treasure token.
card.flavor: Vsichko i vseki si ima cena.

card.name: Mark of the True Fan
card.rules: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+0 and has first strike.
card.flavor: Svinq do grob, no nikoga rob!

card.name: Party Animals
card.rules: First strike Impulsive reaction - Whenever Party Animals becomes the target of a spell or an ability for the first time each turn, up to two target warriors you control get +2/+0 and gain trample until end of turn.
card.flavor: Taq vecher se praim na jivotni!

card.name: Pyroclasmic Fireworker
card.rules: Impulsive reaction - Whenever Pyroclasmic Fireworker becomes the target of a spell or an ability for the first time each turn, it deals 1 damage to each creature.

card.name: Rookie Bazookie
card.rules: Impulsive Reaction - When this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability the first time each turn, it gets -1/-1 until end of turn.

card.name: Shukar Bride
card.rules: Whenever a creature you control becomes tapped, you may pay 1. If you do, put a +1/+1 counter on Shukar Bride and its base power becomes 0 until end of turn.

card.name: Snapjack
card.rules: Target creature gets +3/+2 until end of turn. Create a Clue token and a tapped Treasure token.
card.flavor: ngf**

card.name: Unstoppable Mass
card.rules: Unstoppable Mass attacks each turn if able. Whenever Unstoppable Mass enters the battlefield or attacks, you may sacrifice another permanent. If you do, Unstoppable Mass deals 3 damage to any target.

card.name: Wide Goblin**
card.rules: First strike R, T: Choose one — • Creatures you control get +1/+0 until end of turn. • Creatures you control gain haste until end of turn.

card.name: Shano
card.rules: Create two tokens that are copies of a token permanent you control.

card.name: *Lumbering Battle Men
card.rules: Whenever *Lumbering Battle Men attacks, you may exile another creature you control until *Lumbering Battle Men leaves the battlefield. If you do, put a +1/+1 counter on *Lumbering Battle Men and it gains trample until end of turn.

card.name: Benchwarders
card.rules: When Benchwarders enters the battlefield, create three Stuff tokens.
card.flavor: “ Hui “

card.name: Brotherhood Forger
card.rules: Whenever this creature attacks, target creature you control gets +1/+0 until end of turn. Untap it.
card.flavor: Are be brat, mojesh oshte edna seriq.

card.name: Celebrity Impostor
card.rules: Flash When Celebrity Impostor enters the battlefield, prevent all damage target creature would deal this turn.
card.flavor: “...pozvoli mi te angajiram za eno burzo intervu za moya VLOG vuv kefche.com, nyama da te habya mnogo...”

card.name: Cheat Fight
card.rules: Regenerate target creature you control. That creature fights target creature you don’t control. (The next time it would be destroyed this turn, it isn’t. Instead tap it, remove all damage from it, and remove it from combat.)

card.name: Cigan of Alush-Verish
card.rules: When a land enters the battlefield under your control, you may sacrifice it. If you do, create one Stuff token and one Treasure token.

card.name: Cooksmith
card.rules: Reach When Cooksmith becomes tapped, create a Stuff token.
card.flavor: Ti da vidish kak hranata prai veselbata!

card.name: Dealer of the Paradise
card.rules: Dealer of the Paradise has hexproof as long as it’s untapped. T: Create a Stuff token. G, T: Target creature gains vigilance until end of turn. 1GG, T: Target creature becomes a colorless forest land until end of turn.

card.name: Derby Deployment
card.rules: If you cast this spell during your main phase, create two 3/3 green Human Warrior creature tokens. Each creature you control fights target creature you don’t control. You can’t choose the same target more than once.

card.name: Doner Donator
card.rules: At the beginning of each player’s upkeep, they create a Stuff token.
card.flavor: Shefe, da ti sloja li malko poveche luto?

card.name: Drugmunchers*
card.rules: Drugmunchers* doesn’t untap during your untap step. At the beginning of your upkeep, you may pay G. If you do, untap Drugmunchers* and create a Stuff token.
card.flavor: brat hodi zemi chips i edno boro

card.name: Flea Market
card.rules: Enchant land Enchanted land has “T: Choose one at random • Create a Stuff token. • Create a Treasure token. • Create a Clue token • Put target permanent card from your graveyard on top of its owner’s library.”

card.name: Food-Chain Companion
card.rules: Whenever Food-Chain Companion dies, create a colorless Stuff token
card.flavor: ...bal bal?

card.name: Gains-Gorger Giant
card.rules: Menace Gains-Gorger Giant enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters. Sacrifice a Stuff token: Put a +1/+1 counter on Gains-Gorger Giant.

card.name: Goodwill Progenitor
card.rules: At the beginning of your end step, put a donation counter on Goodwill Progenitor. Remove two donation counters from Goodwill Progenitor: Add three mana of any color.
card.flavor: “Neka horata ne se lujat po zemnoto i vremennoto!” -Dyado Dobri

card.name: Grassroots Exemplar
card.rules: When Grassroots Exemplar dies, draw a card.
card.flavor: Az kato prikazvam ne si govorya samo.

card.name: Grassroots Native
card.rules: Grassroots Native has hexproof as long as it’s untapped. When this creature attacks, scry 1.
card.flavor: “Az gi znam teya, recidivisti narkomani, ot krai vreme si gi znam!”

card.name: Household Sovereign
card.rules: Reach, deathtouch
card.flavor: Sh mi zvunyat tiya, haide da doidat samo, haaa!

card.name: Keeper of Traditions**
card.rules: When Keeper of Traditions** enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on each other elder you control. As long as it’s not your turn, elder creatures you control have hexproof.

card.name: Kosmodisk
card.rules: This spell costs 2 less to cast if it targets an Elder you control. Target creature gets +3/+3 and gains reach until end of turn.

card.name: Labor-Honed Granny
card.rules: Labor-Honed Granny can’t be blocked by creatures with power 1 or less.
card.flavor: az na tvoite godini muknah po triise kila na put za nivata

card.name: Madwoods Gang
card.flavor: ludogorets ludogorets ludogorets ludogorets ludogorets ludogorets ludogorets ludogorets ludogorets

card.name: Mallcrawler
card.rules: Impulsive reaction - Whenever Mallcrawler becomes the target of a spell or an ability for the first time each turn, you may put a land card from your hand onto the battlefield.
card.flavor: “Ne e vajno kuv si a kato kuv shte zapomnyat!!!”

card.name: Mark of the Patriot
card.rules: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has trample.
card.flavor: Jiv e toi, jiv e! Tam na Balkana, Potanal v kurvi leji i pashka. Yunak s dalboka na garba rana.

card.name: Neighbourhood Watchman
card.rules: Impulsive reaction - Whenever Neighbourhood Watchman becomes the target of a spell or an ability for the first time each turn, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn. Scry 1.
card.flavor: Oppaa

card.name: Patron of the Den
card.rules: Impulsive Reaction - When this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability the first time each turn, untap it and another target creature you control.
card.flavor: E gotin are te cherpa nekvo—

card.name: Plow-Through Batka
card.rules: Impulsive reaction - Whenever this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability for the first time each turn, it gains +1/+1 and trample until end of turn.
card.flavor: Kvo me gledash be mishko?!

card.name: Profitalize
card.rules: Destroy target artifact or enchantment. Create a Clue and a tapped Treasure.
card.flavor: Bruto teglo 750 kg. ; dalzhina na tovarna plosht - 2500 mm ; Shirochina - 1600 mm ; Visochina - 2000 mm ; Obshta dalzhina 3700 mm ; 13’ gumi ; 5 leva i 64 stotinki

card.name: Prowling Ultras
card.rules: Impuslive reaction - Whenever this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability for the first time each turn, it gets +1/+1 and gains hexproof until end of turn.

card.name: Shop Keeper
card.rules: When Shop Keeper enters the battlefield, create four Stuff tokens.
card.flavor: “Shopite se znae che ne si pestim nito silite, nito hubavata goshtavka.”

card.name: Suburbian Recidivists
card.rules: At the beginning of your upkeep, destroy target artifact.
card.flavor: Edvam se sdurjam brat mi.

card.name: Trash-Stasher
card.rules: Whenever Trash-Stasher attacks, you may exile up to three target cards from a single graveyard. For each creature card exiled this way, create a Clue token. For each noncreature card exiled this way, Trash-Stasher gets +1/+1 until end of turn. Crew 3

card.name: Unbeaten Woman
card.rules: Impulsive reaction - Whenever Unbeaten Woman becomes the target of a spell or an ability for the first time each turn, put a +1/+1 counter on it. Whenever Unbeaten Woman is dealt damage, put a +1/+1 counter on it. (It must survive the damage to get the counter.)

card.name: Uti Buchvarov, the Plentiful
card.rules: Create a Stuff token. Target creature gets +3/+3. It must be blocked this turn if able. You get an emblem with “At the beginning of your end step, create three Stuff tokens.”

card.name: Vandalist Simpleton
card.rules: When Vandalist Simpleton enters the battlefield, destroy target artifact or enchantment.
card.flavor: Aide chestito baluk!

card.name: Yajte!
card.rules: Create X Stuff tokens.

card.name: *Quarantine patrol
card.rules: Whenever two or more creatures attack you or a planeswalker you control, attacking creatures get -2/-0 until end of turn and you draw a card.

card.name: Baba Penka, Seasoned Chef
card.rules: When Baba Penka, Seasoned Chef enters the battlefield, create two Stuff tokens. W, tap an untapped Elder you control: Create a Stuff token. G, sacrifice a Stuff token: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.

card.name: Brotherbros
card.rules: Whenever another creature you control becomes the target of a spell or ability for the first time each turn, Brotherbros gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
card.flavor: Edin za vsichki, brat za brata.*

card.name: Collective Charm
card.rules: Choose one — • Create a 1/1 blue Soldier creature token. It gains first strike until end of turn. • Target creature gains flying and lifelink until end of turn. • Create two Clue tokens.

card.name: Conductors Squad
card.rules: Creatures can’t attack you unless their controller pays 2 at the beginning of the combat phase.
card.flavor: Bileti i karti za proverka molq...

card.name: Dedo Moni*
card.rules: When Dedo Moni* enters the battlefield or attacks, create a land token named Palace with “T: Add one mana of any color.” Lands named Palace have no abilities as long as you control Dedo Moni*..

card.name: Elusive Izmentor
card.rules: Elusive Izmentor has hexproof if you control another Advisor. Elusive Izmentor has deathtouch if no opponent controls an Advisor.

card.name: Execrator Mangasar*
card.rules: Deathtouch Whenever another goblin you control dies, target player discards a card. If it was a nontoken creature, that player discards a card at random instead. Then that player draws a card.

card.name: General Mutafchiiski*
card.rules: Flash When this creature enters the battlefield or becomes untapped, exile target tapped creature until General Mutafchiiski* leaves the battlefield.
card.flavor: Vsqkakvo narushenie na zakona shte bude nakazvano s lishavane ot svoboda.

card.name: Hierarchical Bystanders
card.rules: Whenever an opponent casts a noncreature spell, scry 1, tap target creature and look at the top card of that player’s library.

card.name: Highblight the Stage
card.rules: As an additional cost to cast Highblight the Stage, sacrifice a permanent. Creatures your opponents control get -2/-2 until end of turn. Tap all creatures. Tap three lands. Those lands don’t untap during their controller’s next untap step.

card.name: Ivan Kostov, the Underminer
card.rules: Ivan Kostov, the Underminer can’t be blocked. At the beginning of each end step, scry X, where X is equal to the life lost by target opponent this turn. If that number is 3 or more, draw a card instead.

card.name: Old Dinko*
card.rules: Hexproof from blue Impulsive reaction - Whenever Old Dinko* becomes the target of a spell or an ability for the first time each turn, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn and you may have it fight target creature you don’t control.
card.flavor: Bulgaria ima nujda ot hora kato men, resheni da zashtitqt durjavata si!

card.name: Ongoing Broadcast
card.rules: Whenever a creature you control attacks and isn’t blocked, it gets +2/+0 until end of turn. B: Target creature you control gets -1/-0 and gains skulk until end of turn.
card.flavor: ...tochno poradi tezi prichini nastoqvame da uvelichim danucite vurhu lekarstvata, koeto shte napravi sredniq bulgarin po-zdrav...

card.name: Pester Patrol
card.rules: Flash Flying When Pester Patrol enters the battlefield, you may tap target noncreature permanent and target creature.

card.name: Protein Charm
card.rules: Choose one — • Put two +1/+1 counters on target attacking creature. • Creatures with power 2 or less can’t block this turn. • Counter target blue noncreature spell.

card.name: Realistic Dinko
card.rules: Shroud Whenever a creature attacks you and isn’t blocked, you may cast Dinko as though it had Flash until end of combat. If you do, it fights another target creature. When another creature enters the battlefield, or attacks you, you may have Dinko fight it.

card.name: Scornful Charm*nonc
card.rules: Choose one — • Target creature can’t be blocked this turn. • Target opponent sacrifices a creature. • Counter target non-creature spell.

card.name: Shanomage
card.rules: Skulk (This creature can’t be blocked by creatures with greater power.) Whenever Shanomage deals combat damage to a player, you may draw a card.
card.flavor: Vsichko e legalno, durjavata ne e oshtetena s dori i edin lev.

card.name: Squatter Vagrant *
card.rules: When Squatter Vagrant * dies or leaves the graveyard, its owner creates a red 1/1 goblin creature token.

card.name: Sustenance Provider
card.rules: When Sustenance Provider enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on up to two other target creatures.

card.name: Tariq Atman, Heavyweight
card.rules: When Tariq Atman, enters the battlefield, each player discards his hand then draws cards equal to the number of creature cards they discarded that way. 1RB, T: Put target creature card from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control. It gains haste.

card.name: Trash Tarasher
card.rules: 3B, T: Put target nonland card from a graveyard on top of its owner’s library. If it’s a creature card, creatures you control gain +1/+0. If it’s a noncreature card, create a Treasure token.

card.name: Urban Charm
card.rules: Choose one — • Target opponent reveals their hand then discards a card. • Destroy target artifact. Urban Charm deals 2 damage to its controller. • Creatures you control get +1/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Burzai
card.rules: Discard a card. If you do, shuffle your library and exile the top two cards. You may play those cards without paying their mana costs.

card.name: Gordost
card.rules: Choose a permanent type. Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each permanent of that type you control.

card.name: Hlqb
card.rules: For each creature you control, create a Stuff token and that creature gains indestructible until end of turn.

card.name: Ot Glavata
card.rules: For each untapped nontoken creature you control, draw a card and gain 2 life. Those creatures cannot attack this turn.

card.name: Saedinenieto
card.rules: Until end of turn whenever a creature deals combat damage to a player, destroy target creature that player controls.

card.name: **Incinerator enthusiast
card.rules: T: Tap target creature unless its controller exiles two cards from their graveyard. If you have more cards in your graveyard than any opponent, put a +1/+1 counter on **Incinerator enthusiast. Whenever one or more noncreature permanent cards are put into a graveyard from anywhere, untap **Incinerator enthusiast and tap target creature.

card.name: Adidas Tracksuit
card.rules: Equipped creature has first strike and hexproof. Equip 3
card.flavor: “Dvesta lea na promocia brat”

card.name: Albiggeroof
card.rules: Albiggeroof costs 1 less for every 2 life you pay as you cast it. 3B: Target creature doesn’t untap during its’ controller’s next untap step. Activate this ability only once each turn.
card.flavor: I dnes pak nai-veche nie produljavame da gubim, zashtoto ne sme otvoreni.

card.name: Arizonka Elder
card.rules: Arizonka Elder is Legendary. W: Regenerate Arizonka Elder and you lose 1 life. Activate this ability only once each turn. (The next time this creature would be destroyed this turn, it isn’t. Instead tap it, remove all damage from it, and remove it from combat.)

card.name: B.D.X.
card.rules: B.D.X. doesn’t untap during your untap step. Crew 4 You may sacrifice a nontoken permanent rather than pay B.D.X.’s crew cost. When you do, untap it.

card.name: Bargain-born
card.rules: When Bargain-born enters the battlefield, choose one — • Exchange control of two target lands. • Put two +1/+1 counters on it. • Create two Treasure tokens.
card.flavor: Samo dneska dve za tri promocia.

card.name: Boulevard Bodyguards
card.rules: When Boulevard Bodyguards enters the battlefield, choose one — • Boulevard Bodyguards fights another target creature. • Create three Treasure tokens.
card.flavor: Vseki edin ot tezi pichove e razlichen. Vnimavai!

card.name: Cane of the Ages
card.rules: Equipped creature gets +1/+1 and has vigilance and reach. Equip Elder 1 Equip 3

card.name: Charged Scooter*
card.rules: Equipped creature gets +1/+0 and has haste. Equip 2 (2: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)
card.flavor: Known among the older generations, as the trusty trotinetka.

card.name: Cingo Blingo
card.rules: Cingo Blingo is a Goblin in addition to its other types. 1R: Add two mana in any combination of colors. Activate this ability only once each turn.
card.flavor: Sa sa vrshtam ot Shtunberg.

card.name: Communism Matrix
card.rules: Activated abilities of artifacts and creatures can’t be activated.
card.flavor: The priests tried cursing it. The mages tried dispelling it. In the end, they all obeyed it.

card.name: Garnments of Prestige
card.rules: Equipped creature has deathtouch. Equip 2 3B: Attach Garnments of Prestige to target human creature you control and put a +1/+1 counter on it.

card.name: Greenery-man
card.rules: Greenery-man is green. 3G: Create a green 0/2 Plant creature token. Activate this ability only once each turn.
card.flavor: Nie mnogo cenim malkite neshta.

card.name: Highway Razer
card.rules: Whenever Highway Razer attacks, you may have it fight target creature. (Each deals damage equal to its power to the other.) When Highway Razer dies, create three Treasure tokens. Crew 2

card.name: Karuca*art
card.rules: Crew 2 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 2 or greater: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.) You may tap a goblin you control rather than pay Karuca’s crew cost.

card.name: Landplower's Traktor
card.rules: Whenever Landplower’s Traktor attacks, look at the top card of your library. If it’s a land card, you may put it onto the battlefield tapped. Crew 0 (Tap one or more untapped creatures you control with total power 0 or greater: This permanent becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)

card.name: Lawkeepers' Pursuer
card.rules: Flying Lawkeepers’ Pursuer can’t attack unless an opponent controls a tapped creature. Crew 2 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 2 or greater: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)

card.name: Lottery Promoter
card.rules: As Lottery Promoter enters the battlefield, choose one — • Lottery Promoter enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter. • Put a -1/-1 counter on target creature. • Create a Treasure token.

card.name: P.A.I.A.K.
card.rules: Trample T: Shuffle target nonland permanent into its owner’s library. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery and if P.A.I.A.K. is a creature. Crew 4

card.name: Pack of Cigarettes
card.rules: T: Target creature you control gets +1/-1 until end of turn
card.flavor: Tiutiunopusheneto uvrejda vasheto zdrave.

card.name: Pessak Listener
card.rules: Pessak Listener has all names of creature cards in addition to its name. 1U: Pessak Listener deals 1 damage to target player unless that player discards a card. Activate this ability only once each turn.
card.flavor: Koi e Pesaka izobshto?

card.name: Pick and Choose, Buffet Duo
card.rules: When Pick and Choose, Buffet Duo enters the battlefield, choose one — • Create two Stuff tokens • Create two Treasure tokens

card.name: Pidgeon
card.rules: Flying Whenever Pidgeon deals combat damage to an opponent, destroy target token permanent that player controls.

card.name: Religious Icon
card.rules: At the beginning of your upkeep, you gain 1 life. 2, sacrifice Religious Icon: Create two Treasure tokens.

card.name: Retiring Comet
card.rules: Vigilance 4: Regenerate Retiring Comet. Whenever Retiring Comet attacks or blocks, put a -1/-1 counter on it. Crew 3

card.name: Road Wrecker
card.rules: When Road Wrecker enters the battlefield, choose one — • Destroy target land. • Create two Treasure tokens.

card.name: Stuffworker
card.rules: When Stuffworker enters the battlefield, choose one — • Create a 0/2 colorless Wall creature token with defender. • Create a Treasure token.

card.name: District Department
card.rules: District Department enters the battlefield tapped. When District Department enters the battlefield, if you control a Soldier, tap target creature. If it’s already tapped, it doesn’t untap during its controller’s next untap step. T: Add W or U.

card.name: Fitness Hall
card.rules: Fitness Hall enters the battlefield tapped. When Fitness Hall enters the battlefield, if you control a Warrior, target creature gets +1/+0 and gains trample until end of turn. T: Add R or G.

card.name: Gateway Palace*
card.rules: When Gateway Palace* enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you pay 2. T: Add one mana of any color.
card.flavor: entrance to ratmen nutcracker joke razpishi lorebook

card.name: Marketpost
card.rules: T: Add C. T, Tap an untapped creature or artifact you control: Add one mana of any color.
card.flavor: “What will happen to us?” they asked. The magaziner paused. “I think… I think that’s up to us now.”

card.name: Pile of Thrash
card.rules: Pile of Thrash enters the battlefield tapped. When Pile of Thrash enters the battlefield, if you control a Goblin, target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn. T: Add B or R.

card.name: Plaza Station
card.rules: T: Add C. T, Tap an untapped creature you control: Add one mana of any color. 5, T: Create a 1/1 colorless Citizen creature token.

card.name: Schematorium
card.rules: Schematorium enters the battlefield tapped. When Schematorium enters the battlefield, if you control an Advisor, target opponent that has lost life this turn loses 2 life. T: Add U or B.

card.name: Village Villa
card.rules: Village Villa enters the battlefield tapped. When Village Villa enters the battlefield, if you control an elder creature, create a Stuff token. T: Add G or W.
